CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
OldVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Prevent user from sharing content in externally hosted meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If a user attends a meeting hosted by an external tenant, the IT admin of the person attending the externally hosted meeting can decide in which externally hosted meetings the user can share their content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Prevent user from sharing content in externally hosted meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: If a user attends a meeting hosted by an external tenant, the IT admin of the person attending the externally hosted meeting can decide in which externally hosted meetings the user can share their content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
OldVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot assisted goal update in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: Easily generate a draft update for a goal with less effort by synthesizing progress and status and form subgoals and related work tailored to your preferences through a selection of dynamic check-in templates.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot assisted check-ins for Viva Goals
OldVersion.description: Unleash the potential of Copilot and effortlessly generate draft check-ins for your OKRs by synthesizing progress, status, and check-in details from associated child items tailored to your preferences through a selection of dynamic check-in templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - M365 Copilot plugin to search and catch up on goals
CurrentVersion.description: The M365 Copilot plugin for Viva Goals empowers you to effortlessly search and pull quick summaries of your team's OKRs right within Teams. Stay ahead of the game by identifying key risks based on the progress and status of your team's OKRs, all seamlessly integrated into the flow of work. Unleash the potential of combining Viva Goals data with M365 information, providing your team with a holistic view for improved productivity and collaboration.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - M365 Chat Plugin
OldVersion.description: M365 Copilot Plugin for Viva Goals empowers you to effortlessly search and pull quick summaries of your team's OKRs right within Teams. Stay ahead of the game by identifying key risks based on the progress and status of your team's OKRs, all seamlessly integrated into the flow of work. Unleash the potential of combining Viva Goals data with M365 information, providing your team with a holistic view for improved productivity and collaboration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
CurrentVersion.description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can generate quizzes from provided materials
OldVersion.description: Generating quizzes from provided materials is one of the most commonly requested features in the education industry, and it is now available in Forms. To save time, users can create quizzes from documents, textbooks, or notes using Copilot. Copilot can create draft quizzes based on the provided materials and users' prompts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
OldVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot assisted goal authoring with Context IQ grounding
CurrentVersion.description: When generating goals, users will be able to add more than one file from context IQ suggestions as references in their prompts to Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Create goals from multiple M365 documents with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to add more than one file from Context IQ suggestions as references in their prompts to Copilot for generating goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
OldVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions Update
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving how suggested times are shown when scheduling a meeting. We are removing the automatically shown suggested times and instead you will need to enable a switch - Find a time - if you want to see suggested times. If you enable the toggle, the new availability view on time suggestion tiles will make it easier to find a suitable time with more clarity on everyone's availability. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions Update
OldVersion.description: We are improving how suggested times are shown when scheduling a meeting. We are removing the automatically shown suggested times and instead you will need to enable a switch - Find a time - if you want to see suggested times. If you enable the toggle, the new availability view on time suggestion tiles will make it easier to find a suitable time with more clarity on everyone's availability. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Intune policy available for specific primary account in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: This adds Intune policy in the new Outlook for Windows to a specific primary account based on Active Directory Primary SMTP address. This will ease the setup process for new managed devices and guarantee that company policies will always be respected. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: School Connection –  Providing access to parents via their phone number
CurrentVersion.description:
The School Connection app in Microsoft Teams (mobile) empowers parents and guardians to engage, support, and monitor their student's learning at school. This release enables a parent/guardian to get access to their child’s profile in School Connection if they login to Teams (mobile) with their phone number and the school has registered that phone number as a parent/guardian contact. Additionally, a parent/guardian will easily get access to their child’s profile if the phone number or email address that is registered by the school is saved as a login information in their Microsoft account. Learn more about School Connection at the link below.
More info: https://parent.microsoft.com/

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: School Connection –  Providing access to parents via their phone number
OldVersion.description:
The School Connection app in Microsoft Teams (mobile) empowers parents and guardians to engage, support, and monitor their student's learning at school. This release enables a parent/guardian to get access to their child’s profile in School Connection if they login to Teams (mobile) with their phone number and the school has registered that phone number as a parent/guardian contact. Additionally, a parent/guardian will easily get access to their child’s profile if the phone number or email address that is registered by the school is saved as a login information in their Microsoft account. Learn more about School Connection at the link below.
More info: https://parent.microsoft.com/

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

OldVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
OldVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add brand images in M365 Copilot from SharePoint organization asset libraries
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint and Word connects with your SharePoint organization asset library, making it easy to find and add images approved by your company to keep your presentation or document on brand.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add brand images in M365 Copilot from SharePoint organization asset libraries
OldVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint and Word connects with your SharePoint organization asset library, making it easy to find and add images approved by your company to keep your presentation or document on brand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy visibility for users with Copilot SKU and VL Seeded/Premium
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot Academy will be available for all users with a Copilot for Microsoft License and any of Viva Learning licenses (Seeded or Premium). Admins will also be able to control visibility of Copilot Academy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy visibility for users with Copilot SKU and VL Seeded/Premium
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot Academy will be available for all users with a Copilot for Microsoft License and any of Viva Learning licenses (Seeded or Premium). Admins will also be able to control visibility of Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
OldVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Use the Egress API to provide learner access to “My Learning” records
CurrentVersion.description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy Nudges to all Copilot SKU users (Seeded and Premium Viva Learning Users)
CurrentVersion.description: All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows
